definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
short name for Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2]
to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]

sentences.english: A whole gang of builders is there tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚整队建筑工人都在那儿了。

sentences.english: Meet Grady, a twenty-nine year old construction worker.
sentences.chinese: 米特格雷迪，一个二十九岁的建筑工人。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 许可证持有人须为驻工地建筑工人提供流动洗手间。

sentences.english: A construction worker pushes a plank which boards up to enclose the building site in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海，建筑工人托起木板，封住工地。

sentences.english: The construction workers accidentally dug out a dried and preserved dead body from underground.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人无意中从地下挖出一具尸蜡。

sentences.english: Construction workers erecting an apartment complex thought he might have worked there.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工地的建筑工人也认为何文曾在那里工作过。

sentences.english: Thee construction workers are laying the foundations for a 28-story building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人们正在为一座28层的高楼打地基。

sentences.english: The builders have plotted out the area ready for the houses.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人已把这个地区分割成块准备盖房子。

sentences.english: The cerebration workers are birthing the foundations for a 28-story building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人们正在为一座28层的高楼打地基。

sentences.english: Around Beijing's small alleyways , an underground economy caters to construction workers.
sentences.chinese: 在北京的小胡同中，黑市迎合了建筑工人的需求。

sentences.english: The builders have marked off a corner of field ready for the new building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人已经把这块地划出一个角落来盖新房。

sentences.english: Construction workers walked out in protest at the sacking of bricklayers over 50.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人举行罢工，抗议解雇五十岁以上的砌砖工人。

sentences.english: It was then that the professions of architect and builder was first born.
sentences.chinese: 正是这个原因，建筑师和建筑工人这些职业诞生了。

sentences.english: I was apprenticed to a builder when I was fourteen.
sentences.chinese: 14岁时，我拜一个建筑工人为师当学徒。

sentences.english: A construction worker was killed when the 13-story building toppled over almost intact.
sentences.chinese: 大楼倒塌造成一名建筑工人死亡。

sentences.english: The Builders had put up a tall structure Between the shops.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人已经在商店之间建起一座高层建筑。

definition: migrant worker/temporary worker enlisted on a public project
